name: Next Hand Master
description:
Welcome to NextHandMaster! Here we will test your real skills in managing several objects with just one hand, and do not think out any extra thoughts about the name, here you will have pain, cry, as well as millions and billions of suffering, see who becomes the real NextHandMaster!

Gameplay:
NextHandMaster is an action puzzle game where you have to not only put your hands and reaction into action, but also strain your head in order to think through every step, because any ill-conceived step may be the last.
